roleset.name: make life hard for a performer

example.name: the one example
example.text: The players were heckled [*]by a patron during a July 4, 1988, game with the Martinsville Phillies.
example.arg: during a July 4, 1988, game with the Martinsville Phillies.

roleset.note: HECKLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'heckle' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from heckle.01-v predicate notes)
